params.contributor: Address of the contributor to claim for

params.amount: Amount of funding token to contribute
Amount of funding token to contribute
params.contributor: Address of the actual contributor (must have approved USDC to this contract)

returns._active: Whether loan has been disbursed to borrower
returns._completed: Whether loan has been fully repaid
returns._defaulted: Whether loan is currently in default
returns._fundraisingActive: Whether fundraising is still accepting contributions
returns._secondsUntilDue: Seconds remaining until due date (0 if past due)

returns._0: true if past due date and principal remains unpaid

repay(uint256).details: Anyone can repay on behalf of borrower. Overpayments distributed to lenders as bonus.

params.amount: Amount to repay (excess beyond outstanding principal distributed to lenders)
Amount to repay (excess beyond outstanding principal distributed to lenders)
params.payer: Address of the actual payer (must have approved USDC to this contract)

cancelFundraise().notice: Borrower can cancel loan anytime before disbursing funds

cancelIfNoDisburse().notice: Cancel a fully-funded loan if borrower fails to disburse within the window

claim().notice: Claim your share of repaid principal

claimFor(address).notice: Gasless claim - relayer calls on behalf of contributor

claimableAmount(address).notice: View claimable repayment amount for a contributor

contribute(uint256).notice: Contribute funds to this loan during the fundraising period

contributeFor(address,uint256).notice: Gasless contribution - relayer calls on behalf of contributor

disburse().notice: Disburse the fully-funded loan to the borrower

getStatus().notice: Get comprehensive loan status in a single call

isDefaulted().notice: Check if the loan is currently in default

refund().notice: Claim refund if loan was cancelled or failed to reach funding goal

repay(uint256).notice: Repay principal on this loan (flexible: any amount, anytime before/after maturity)

repayFor(address,uint256).notice: Gasless repayment - relayer calls on behalf of payer

secondsUntilDue().notice: Get seconds remaining until due date (0 if past due)
